mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO TB_WX_QRCODE ( QRNO, QRNAME, QRTYPE, QRURL, ACCOUNTID, QRPATH, SCENETYPE, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME, CREATOR ) VALUES( #{qrNo:VARCHAR}, #{qrName:VARCHAR}, #{qrType:VARCHAR}, #{qrUrl:VARCHAR}, #{accountid:VARCHAR}, #{qrPath:VARCHAR}, #{sceneType:VARCHAR}, #{createtime:TIMESTAMP}, #{updatetime:TIMESTAMP}, #{creator:VARCHAR}
)
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_WX_QRCODE SET QRNAME = #{qrName:VARCHAR}, QRTYPE = #{qrType:VARCHAR}, QRURL = #{qrUrl:VARCHAR}, ACCOUNTID = #{accountid:VARCHAR}, QRPATH = #{qrPath:VARCHAR}, SCENETYPE = #{sceneType:VARCHAR}, CREATETIME = #{createtime:TIMESTAMP}, UPDATETIME = #{updatetime:TIMESTAMP}, CREATOR = #{creator:VARCHAR} WHERE QRNO = #{qrNo}
mapper.delete:

SELECT * FROM TB_WX_QRCODE WHERE 1=1 and ( qrcode.QRNO LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%')
or qrcode.QRNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%')
or qrcode.QRTYPE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%')
or qrcode.QRURL LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%')
or qrcode.ACCOUNTID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%')
or qrcode.QRPATH LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%')
or qrcode.SCENETYPE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%')
or qrcode.CREATETIME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%')
or qrcode.UPDATETIME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%')
or qrcode.CREATOR LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%')
